#summary The JCatapult Ant clean plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin allows applications to delete intermediate files and compiled source files. JCatapult projects place all of these files into the _${dir.target}_ directory and this plugin deletes that directory.

This plugin contains a single XML file that should be imported like this:

{{{
<import file="${ant.home}/plugins-jcatapult/clean/1.0/clean.xml"/>
}}}

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== clean ==

Cleans the project.
